com.joliciel.talismane.lexicon

Interface Lexicon

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PosTaggerLexicon
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    EmptyLexicon, LexiconChain, LexiconFile

    public interface Lexicon
extends java.io.Serializable
    An interface for retrieving lexical information from a lexicon.
    Author:
    Assaf Urieli

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.Iterator<LexicalEntry> getAllEntries()
      Returns all lexical entries in this lexicon, without any guaranteed order.
      java.util.List<LexicalEntry> getEntries(java.lang.String word)
      Return all lexical entries for a given word.
      java.util.List<LexicalEntry> getEntriesForLemma(java.lang.String lemma)
      Return all lexical entries for a given lemma.
      java.lang.String getName()
      This lexicon's name, for use in features.
